manufacturing.notes:
This place does submarine construction and ship servicing.

The locations page mentions submarine building in Kiel. I found the Howaldtswerke shipyard in Kiel when I went to
google and searched "thyssenkrupp" in the city of Kiel. The company page mentions the merger of
Howaldtswerke-Deutsche Werft and something else all under thyssenkrupp and the wikipedia shows that
Howaldtswerke-Deutsche Werft has a marine yard in Kiel. So multiple fingers all point at this building boat stuff.

This place seems to manufacture communication equipment for boat/submarine stuff. (marinekommunikation translates to
"marine communications"). "Hagenuk Marinekommunikation" is the company name and it's a subsidiary of the ATLAS
ELECTRONIK Group.
